instruction: Rate the following text based on readability.
input: Organizational changes and the massive restructuring of state institutions, as well as the newly-amended laws, are key components in the overall reform process, wherein the considerable reshaping of the legal framework for the country’s economic and social development is seen to be essential.
output: 8/10. This text has good grammatical and syntactical coherence and is written using moderate, formal language. It may still be difficult for some readers to understand due to the use of technical language and terms.
